Articles.Content:
Great work Hatbat!

What version of Cacteye are you using? I see some asteroid day parts inside the telescope, so I'm a little curious.

I wasn't happy with how the regular cacteye telescope didn't have a visible lense, meaning I wouldn't have been able to do the shot in which the telescope reflects the stars. It looks a little funky but I'm pretty happy with how the asteroid day telescope fits inside the cacteye telescope.

To clarify: it's the latest version of cacteye I could find whilst filming. It didn't seem to be entirely working though.

55 minutes ago, HatBat said:

I wasn't happy with how the regular cacteye telescope didn't have a visible lense, meaning I wouldn't have been able to do the shot in which the telescope reflects the stars. It looks a little funky but I'm pretty happy with how the asteroid day telescope fits inside the cacteye telescope.

To clarify: it's the latest version of cacteye I could find whilst filming. It didn't seem to be entirely working though.

 

Yeah, There's a bug I'm hunting down with collecting science, It's a nasty one all right.
Yo, Hatbat what mods are those?
